0: The room was very nice and we had a great view of the river
The staff was friendly and helpful
Indoor pool was a nice feature for the kids
the rooms were great and clean
CVG airport is an easy 15 minute drive
The continental breakfast offers a variety of food bagels and cream cheese sweet rolls eggs and sausage or bacon fresh fruit piping hot waffles and coffee is brewing all day
We stayed in coordination with our childrens hospital visit
1: It was a spur of the moment decision to bring the family downwe had a nice weekend
In the area for a wedding reception and decided to book a room for both a romantic night out of the house away from the kids and to not risk driving impaired
Love Hampton Inns just not this one
We ended up going into downtown Cincinnati for dinner which was easy to do
Yes it was a holiday weekend and therefore the hotel should have been better prepared for that than they were
I would recommend the Hotel to everyone I know
The location was central to what we needed but surrounding area was questionable
can not say enough about how nice the maids and the rest of the staff were
I would def stay here again with no hesitation
2: Room was nice and spacious but the bed was somewhat hard
When I asked where was good to eat the girl at the counter acted like she had never been asked that before
Over all for the money it was a good deal as I had checked hotels in Cincinnati they were much more expensive
The location is not the best as far as the surrounding scenery
Close to downtown Cinci without the downtown price
The only thing is that the neighborhood might not be the best as someone stole gas from our car during our stay
Visit was a 3 night one for a 2 day woodworking course
We were on 6th floor and could look out at the Ohio River and the Cincinnati skyline until next morning
We could not be moved because the entire hotel was sold out
